column5: Hi Everyone, I am thinking of upgrading my HDS5 Gen 2, to a 7 model - Probably just a Gen3 in the same line.  My question though is on the Transducer, and if I would have to change that out to go to the next model.  I also have a LSS1.   If anyone can assist, let me know. Thanks in advance. Adam

The Lss1 series is very old technology and it will limit what your new unit can show you if you decide to use it. Basically your new system will not be as good an upgrade as you hope for. This is an adapter that MIGHT make it work with   https://www.solidsignal.com/pview.asp?p=000-11040-001 I would upgrade the unit 100 percent with the correct transducer rather than spend  100 bucks for the adapter and then having a limited upgrade.  Art
Go all the way. Hold your nose get your credit card out and go all the way. Latest and greatest, freeze the technology and stay there until the next time.
https://www.westmarine.com/buy/raymarine--axiom-9-rv-multifunction-display-with-realvision-and-navionics-north-america-charts--18083642 Here is my next unit I think. Art
Ray Marina looks like a great unit. Just a case of ID how you fish and get the unit that assist you the most.
